name: The Cryptic Mutation Conundrum
description:
The Cryptic Mutation Conundrum

The Cryptic Mutation Conundrum is an action - reflexion FPS game set in a gloomy laboratory with supernatural elements. The gameplay is based on solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles with powers acquired throughout the game.

Controls
  • Left Mouse Click : Ability A
  • Right Mouse Click : Ability B
  • Mouse : Move the camera
  • ZQSD : Movements
  • Spacebar : Jump
  • Left Control : Crouch
  • E : Interact with objects
Team

Game Designers : BAO Michael, FOUSSAT Alexandre, KHAINE Rayan

Game Programers : LACOMBE Victor, LE LANN Léo, ROMERO Santino

Game Artists : MARTIN Aurore, PUIGCERVER Marion
